title: New Widget - Document Folder List
content:
...finally eh, been a while on the new widget front  

### Document Folder List Control

Renders out a document library tree  
  

#### Features

*   Expanded\\Collapsed initial state
*   Set open\\closed folder icons
*   Document Filter Expression
*   Pick Library OR folder
*   Large or small icons (uses the DocumentList CSS)
*   Show\\Hide TreeView node line images
*   Cacheable results
